item.description:
The monthly board meeting of the Friends of Myles Standish State Forest is open to the public. 

We are anticipating the loss of a number of founding members from the board this coming May owing to term limits.  We need new people to join us. Are you interested? Let Rose know.  We particularly need new board members who can represent the interests of :

  • Equestrians
  • Cottage Owners
  • Skiers
  • Bicyclists

Our Board bylaws require us to seek out and recruit members from eight MSSF user groups identified when the group was started.  If you know anyone from the above groups who actively uses Myles Standish, please let them know!

If you are not from one of those groups, we always welcome people who responsibly enjoy Myles Standish State Forest and want to become involved in hike/bike/trail ride leadership, trail maintenance, wildlife and endangered plant protection or one of the many other activities sponsored by the Friends in and around the State Forest.

For information on membership, visit the Friends web page (www.friendsmssf.com).
item.how_to_find_us: "The barn" is 100 yards up Lower College Pond Road from the forest headquarters.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Friends board meeting for January
